Location:
- Backyard, side of house, on concrete pad near wooden fence.

Observations:
- Goodman outdoor condenser unit; top fan grille intact.
- Cabinet fins appear straight with no visible dents or corrosion.
- Screws secure; unit looks level.
- Light vegetation around base; no obvious leaks or staining.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Maintain clearance around unit (minimum 12+ inches each side; keep debris/grass trimmed).
- Periodic routine maintenance and coil cleaning; schedule annual professional inspection. 
- Ensure electrical disconnect is accessible and wiring/conduit remain intact.
